description: This file defines a React component for handling the OAuth callback process for Confluence integration. It manages the OAuth state (success/error), displays feedback messages, and redirects after successful authorization.

methods.name: ConfluenceOAuthCallbackPage
methods.description: Main component that wraps the inner logic inside a Suspense boundary to handle OAuth callback display.

methods.name: ConfluenceOAuthCallbackInner
methods.description: Inner component handling the OAuth process, state management, and UI rendering.
